Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the progress made in the fight against ISIS under the Trump administration by stating that they have done more in eight months than the previous administration did in many years.
Understate: The claim understates the progress made in the fight against ISIS under the previous administration by not acknowledging the offensive operations that began under Obama and the territorial collapse that occurred during his presidency.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to fully substantiate the comparison between the achievements of the Trump administration and the previous administration in the fight against ISIS.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the progress made under the Trump administration was built upon the work done under the previous administration.
